greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of zeta(3)/8.
reference: James Dodson, The Mathematical Repository Containing Analytical Solutions of Five Hundred Questions: Mostly Selected from Scarce and Valuable Authors, (1748), page 375.
formula: Equals Sum_{k>=1} (-1)^(k+1) * H(k)/(k+1)^2, where H(k) = A001008(k)/A002805(k) is the k-th harmonic number. - _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 22 2020
results.author: _Terry D. Grant_, Sep 15 2016
